eu.amidst.core.variables

Class VariableBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.amidst.core.variables.VariableBuilder

  • public class VariableBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    This class allows to build and handle a Variable of a Bayesian network.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      VariableBuilder()
      Empty constructor.
      VariableBuilder(Attribute att)
      Creates a new Variable given an Attribute object.
      VariableBuilder(Attribute att, DistributionTypeEnum typeDist)
      Creates a new Variable given an Attribute object and a distribution type.

    • Method Summary

      Returns the Attribute associated with this Variable.

      Returns the state space type StateSpaceType of this variable.

      Tests whether this Variable is observable or not.
